text: Who's Next is the fifth album by the English rock band The Who. It was released on July 31, 1971 by Decca and MCA in the United States and August 25, 1971 in the United Kingdom through Track and Polydor. Who's Next was a huge success when it was released, and has been certified 3x platinum by the RIAA. == Track listing == All songs written by Pete Townshend except where noted. (All songs copyright Towser Tunes) ;Side one # "Baba O'Riley" – 5:11 # "Bargain" – 5:33 # "Love Ain't for Keeping" – 2:12 # "My Wife" (John Entwistle) – 3:41 # "The Song Is Over" – 6:16 ;Side two # * "Getting in Tune" – 4:50 # "Going Mobile" – 3:42 # "Behind Blue Eyes" – 3:43 # "Won't Get Fooled Again" – 8:32 == Other websites == Category:1971 albums Category:Rock albums Category:The Who albums
title: Who's Next
